message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. It's worth a significant sum to me, but I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,250,000.  This is a fair price that allows both of us to benefit. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's ready to pay $1,000,000. Let me know your decision.
